ygData.subject: Re: New patch Tuesday, who hates us at Verant?
ygData.msgSnippet: errr, what MR songs are you stacking?  i can still stack guardian rhythms and psalm of mystic shielding after the patch. Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard,
ygData.messageBody:
errr, what MR songs are you stacking? i can still stack guardian rhythms
and psalm of mystic shielding after the patch.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 7:39 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] New patch Tuesday, who hates us at Verant?
>
>
> From: jhenders@...
>
>
> Sigh. After the last late night patch, I discovered the recently
> discussed stacking of magic resist songs no longer works.
> What's up with
> that? Was this too powerful a benefit? Meanwhile, the
> accellerando still
> cancels sow when it wears off, as does levitate and of course the L30
> song still doesnt work. Wish they would take a break from nerfing and
> fix some bugs.
>
> I also discovered with great joy that our music skills are
> capped at 200
> along with our combat skills. Guess I can't complain about
> that too much
> as even a warrior's combat skills cap at 200, and you'd think the
> warrior would be better at them than other fighters. But if that's the
> case, why are the magic users still shooting up over 200 in their
> casting skills?
>
> A very depressed L41 bard. :(
>
>
> --
> Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.

> b+++ e* s-/+ n-(?) h++ f+g+ w+++ y*
